frame.txt: 第九届深圳国际无人机展览会（Shenzhen International UAV EXPO 2024）将于5月24日至5月26日在深圳会展中心举行。ZHT将携最新的100公斤级物流运输无人机参展。让我们一起期待这位“大块头”的亮相，欢迎莅临1C251展位，与我们面对面交流。
frame.txt_en: The 9th Shenzhen International UAV EXPO 2024 will be held at Shenzhen Convention and Exhibition Center from May 24 to May 26. ZHT will carry the latest 100 kg class logistics transport drone to participate in this exhibition. Let’s look forward to this big guy together, and welcome to visit our booth at 1C251 for face-to-face communication with us.
